An email notification will also always b: An email notification will also always be sent in case the user viewed the related info through the platform.
Anomalies are automatically analysed to: Anomalies are automatically analysed to identify abuses or unusual usage spikes.
Any donation made to support GlobaLeaks: Any donation made to support GlobaLeaks will be greatly appreciated; it will help us to further improve GlobaLeaks, making the world a better place

Clicking the 'admin' link in the top-rig: Clicking the 'admin' link in the top-right corner of the page will bring you here.
Contexts are the categories to be select: Contexts are the categories to be selected by whistleblowers, when they perform their submission. Make sure to make them pertinent to your project.

Follow us on Twitter if you like to be p: Follow us on Twitter if you like to be profiled by NSA:
For each activity, the system will send: For each activity, the system will send you an apparently meaningless email. This should be used when you are on the move, even with an unsafe email or when you don't have your PGP key with you.
For technical support inquiries you can: For technical support inquiries you can write us at:
Give a concise description of your proje: Dê uma descrição concisa do seu projeto
Give your whistleblowing project a good: Dê um bom nome e descreva o seu projeto de denúncia para convidar os informadores para submeter. Certifique-se que os seus objetivos do seu projeto são claros.

HTTPS does not protect the content of my: HTTPS não protege o conteúdo da minha denúncia, nem a minha identidade

Please configure your PGP keys in the re: Por favor, configure os seus códigos PGP na página de preferências do recetor.
Please do not forward or share this emai: Please do not forward or share this email; each tip-off allows a limited number of accesses and downloads before being permanently destroyed and nobody (not even the server administrator) can recover an expired or deleted tip-off.
Please make sure that all related data i: Please make sure that all related data is properly deleted so that the receivers won't be able to further access to it.
Please never disclose these files until: Please never disclose these files until an appropriate analysis, fact checking, journalistic and technical redaction process. For more information about redaction of documents you should consult this page: https://github.com/globaleaks/GlobaLeaks/wiki/Redaction-process.
Please select which language you wish to: Por favor, selecione o idioma que deseja utilizar.
Please support Hermes through their dona: Please support Hermes through their donation page.
Please take care that all associated dat: Por favor, tenha cuidado porque serão devidamente apagados todos os dados associados.
Postpone Tip expiration date: Data de expiração para adiar a Denúncia
Public resources can be accessed via Tor: Os recursos públicos pode ser acedidos via Tor2web
Receivers are very important for a Globa: Receivers are very important for a GlobaLeaks based project. They are the people responsible for receiving the whistleblowers' submissions, verifying their authenticity and for taking action too. Choose them wisely.
O Recetores podem aceder via Tor2web.

Remember to provide proper security advi: Remember to provide proper security advice to Whistleblowers:

Server temporarly unusable due to resour: Server temporarly unusable due to resource exhaustion; advise the Admin if you can.

Since GlobaLeaks users are all anonymous: Since GlobaLeaks users are all anonymous, it is not possible to perform anomaly detection based on user policies.

The Tor Browser includes various privacy: The Tor Browser includes various privacy and security enhancements not present in other browsers.
The application makes use of Cookies onl: A aplicação só utiliza os Cookies para propósitos de segurança e sem rastrear quaisquer dados.

The currently adopted policy is to check: The currently adopted policy is to check if some thresholds are reached within a 30 seconds observation window.

The included files may contain informati: The included files may contain information that could lead to the identification of the whistleblower and/or that is sensitive for the people and organisations involved.
The key code is either invalid or the su: The key code is either invalid or the submission has expired.

The setting is enabled at a global level: The setting is enabled at a global level.

The system forces users to change the pa: O sistema força os utilizadores a alterarem a palavra-passe no primeiro início de sessão.

There are three types of users in GlobaL: There are three types of users in GlobaLeaks: the administrator, the receiver and the whistleblower. Your username for accessing the server as the administrator will be 'admin'.
These are the thresholds used to identif: These are the thresholds used to identify anomalous behaviour:
They would like you to pay special atten: They would like you to pay special attention to the information and material contained therein. Please keep in mind that whistleblowers often expose themselves to high personal risks for the public interest. Therefore the material that they provide with this tip-off should be considered of high importance.
This email will be used for ping notific: Este correio eletrónico será utilizada para as notificações de ping.
This happens whenever encryption is unav: Isto acontece porque a codificação está indisponível.
This interface allows to configure the e: This interface allows to configure the email templates used for secure email notifications.
Esta interface permite configurar os modelos de correio eletrónico usados para as notificações de mensagem inseguras.
This interface may help you spot anomali: This interface may help you spot anomalies with your server.
This interface may help you understand h: This interface may help you understand how the server can be configured and provides some info on how to connect to other GlobaLeaks users and experts.

This interface may help you understand how the server is used by the whistleblower. It displays the submissions currently on the server and a few statistics on the kind of usage (activity, files, comments).
This interface shows user activity on yo: This interface shows user activity on your server. It may be helpful in detecting anomalies and providing support to the receivers using your server.
This interface shows you the unusual beh: Esta interface mostra-lhe o comportamento não usual que o sistema identificou.
This is a work-in-progress of the admini: This is a work-in-progress of the administration interface that you will see after logging onto the platform as an admin.
This is an email to inform you that the: This is an email to inform you that the PGP key of the following users is going to expire or has already expired:
This is an email to inform you that your: This is an email to inform you that your PGP key is expiring or has already expired.
This is an email to notify you about a n: This is an email to notify you about a new message from the whisleblower.
This is an email to notify you that %Com: This is an email to notify you that %CommentSource% has commented on a previous submission.
This is an email to notify you that a wh: This is an email to notify you that a whistleblower has selected you as a valuable recipient for his/her submission.
This is an email to notify you that a whistleblower has updated a submission with new material.
This is the default welcome message: Esta é a mensagem de boas-vindas predefinida
This may lead to unintended access to th: This may lead to unintended access to the files by the server administrator or others in case the server is compromised.
This means that if the server running Gl: This means that if the server running GlobaLeaks were to be seized it would be possible to extract the files that have been submitted.
This means that the submitted files will: This means that the submitted files will be stored in plaintext on the server.
This platform makes use of GlobaLeaks so: This platform makes use of GlobaLeaks software specifically designed to protect the identity of the submitter and of the receiver in the exchange of leaked materials.
Este recetor não pode ser desrmarcado.
Este recetor não pode ser selecionado.

This won't preserve Whistleblower's anon: This won't preserve Whistleblower's anonymity while preserving submission confidentiality.
Tip [%TipNum%] is going to expire in %Ex: A denúncia [%TipNum%] vai a expirar em %ExpirationWatch% horas
To ensure your anonymity you must use th:
To ensure your anonymity you must use the Tor Browser to visit this site.
You acknowledge that failure to do so will result in the inability to technically protect your anonymity.
To further enhance your security, please follow these instructions:
1) In the event that you would like to remain anonymous, do not submit any personal information. (e.g. your name or relationship to the offender. Do not submit any information that can be traced back to you.)
2) Please do not submit your report on a PC provided by your employer. Particularly an intranet connection may jeopardize your anonymity.
To know more about GlobaLeaks Security y: To know more about GlobaLeaks Security you can read the following document:
To properly organize your project, pleas: Para organizar devidamente o seu projeto, por favor,  leia as seguintes linhas diretrizes:
To report a bug or request a feature in: To report a bug or request a feature in GlobaLeaks software, please open a ticket describing the issue you're encountering or the new feature request:
To use GlobaLeaks Cookies must be enable: Para utilizar o GlobaLeaks, os Cookies devem estar ativados.
Type your new password again: Digite de novo a sua palavra-passe
Update notification and encryption setti: Notificação da atualização e definições da encriptação
Use the 16 digit key code to log in. It: Use the 16 digit key code to log in. It will allow you to view any messages we sent you, and also to add extra info.
We do not discriminate based on race and: We do not discriminate based on race and gender, but we do against computers :)
We will try to get back to you as soon a: We will try to get back to you as soon as possible!
Welcome to GlobaLeaks Administration Int: Bem-vindo à Interface de Administração do GlobaLeaks
What is the topic of your whistleblowing: Qual é o tópico do seu projeto de denúncia?
When the option is re-enabled the spoole: Quando a opção for reativada as mensagens em fila serão enviadas.
Which of the following statements is tru: Qual das seguintes declarações é a verdadeira?
Whistleblowers can perform submissions v: O Informador pode efetuar submissões via Tor2web.
With a HTTPS submission you are exposing:
Com a submissão em HTTPS está a expor-se você mesmo aos riscos em que alguérm irá saber do que submeteu, sem saber que você o submeteu.

Em vez disso, com a Submissão Anónima está completamente protegido, não é possível para terceiros saberem que submeteu algo, nem o que submeteu.

We strongly advise you to go for an Anonymous Submission.

Para efetuar uma Submissão Anónima, em vez de utilizar o seu Navegador da Web normal (Internet Explorer, Chrome, Firefox, Opera, etc.), deverá utilizar o Tor Browser, isto é uma parte especial do programa criado para ativar a Navegação da Web Anónima.
Without a valid PGP key, the system will: Without a valid PGP key, the system will not be able to send encrypted notifications to you.
Without a valid PGP key, the system will not be able to send them encrypted notifications.
You are aware of the risks involved. Go: Está ciente dos riscos envolvidos. Continue, mas considere-se avisado.
You are connecting to the server without: You are connecting to the server without anonymity and this server supports only anonymous submissions
You are strongly advised to visit this s: You are strongly advised to visit this site using the desktop app called Tor Browser, that protects your identity.
You can reach GlobaLeaks's support chat: You can reach GlobaLeaks's support chat via IRC on OFTC server on channel #globaleaks:
You have finished configuring your Globa: You have finished configuring your GlobaLeaks site. You are now ready to further tweak it with the admin interface.
You have not configured your encryption: You have not configured your encryption keys, so the files will be stored on the GlobaLeaks server un-encrypted.
You now have %EventCount% good reasons t: You now have %EventCount% good reasons to reconnect where is matters
You should extend its validity and updat: You should extend its validity and update the key present on the GlobaLeaks servers you are subscribed to or upload a new key.
You will not be able to send a submissio: Não irá poder enviar uma submissão.
You're running GlobaLeaks version: Está a executar a versão do GlobaLeaks
A sua submissão foi bem sucedida.
